languages.text: "Что?" {n}— Абеляр, кажется, теряет дар речи.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, любые подозрения о неподобающих неуставных чувствах или отношениях совершенно беспочвенны и почти оскорбительны!" {n}Он хмурится и добавляет:{/n} "Совершенно беспочвенны".

"What?" {n}Abelard appears to have lost the power of speech.{/n} "Lord Captain, any allegations of improper feelings or unsanctioned relations are utterly baseless and bordering on the insulting!" {n}He furrows his brow and adds,{/n} "Utterly baseless."
languages.original_text: "Что?" {n}— Абеляр, кажется, теряет дар речи.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, любые подозрения о неподобающих неуставных чувствах или отношениях совершенно беспочвенны и почти оскорбительны!" {n}Он хмурится и добавляет:{/n} "Совершенно беспочвенны".

traits.locale_text: "What?" {n}Abelard appears to have lost the power of speech.{/n} "Lord Captain, any allegations of improper feelings or unsanctioned relations are utterly baseless and bordering on insulting!" {n}He furrows his brow and repeats,{/n} "Utterly baseless."

"What?" {n}Abelard appears to have lost the power of speech.{/n} "Lord Captain, any allegations of improper feelings or unsanctioned relations are utterly baseless and bordering on insulting!" {n}He furrows his brow and adds,{/n} "Utterly baseless."

"What?" {n}Abelard appears to have lost the power of speech.{/n} "Lord Captain, any allegations of improper feelings or unsanctioned relations are utterly baseless and bordering on insulting!" {n}He furrows his brow and adds,{/n} "Utterly baseless."

"What?" {n}Abelard appears to have lost the power of speech.{/n} "Lord Captain, any allegations of improper feelings or unsanctioned relations are utterly baseless and bordering on the insulting!" {n}He furrows his brow and adds,{/n} "Utterly baseless."

languages.text: “什么？”{n}阿贝拉德似乎都不知道该怎么说话了。{/n}“舰长大人，这毫无根据！这种不正当的感觉，或是未经许可的关系完全是子虚乌有！这几乎算得上是侮辱！”{n}他皱起眉头，又重复了一遍。{/n}“这毫无根据。”
languages.original_text: "What?" {n}Abelard appears to have lost the power of speech.{/n} "Lord Captain, any allegations of improper feelings or unsanctioned relations are utterly baseless and bordering on the insulting!" {n}He furrows his brow and adds,{/n} "Utterly baseless."

traits.locale_text: “什么？”{n}阿贝拉德似乎都不知道该怎么说话了。{/n}“舰长大人，这毫无根据！这种不正当的感觉，或是未经许可的关系完全是子虚乌有！这几乎算得上是侮辱！”{n}他皱起眉头，又重复了一遍。{/n}“这毫无根据。”

languages.original_text: "What?" {n}Abelard appears to have lost the power of speech.{/n} "Lord Captain, any allegations of improper feelings or unsanctioned relations are utterly baseless and bordering on insulting!" {n}He furrows his brow and adds,{/n} "Utterly baseless."

languages.text: «¿Cómo?». {n}Abelard parece haber perdido la capacidad de hablar.{/n} «Lord Capitán, cualquier alegación de sentimientos impropios o relaciones no autorizadas es completamente infundada y rayana en el insulto!». {n}Frunce el ceño y repite:{/n} «Completamente infundadas».
languages.original_text: "What?" {n}Abelard appears to have lost the power of speech.{/n} "Lord Captain, any allegations of improper feelings or unsanctioned relations are utterly baseless and bordering on the insulting!" {n}He furrows his brow and adds,{/n} "Utterly baseless."

traits.locale_text: «¿Cómo?». {n}Abelard parece haber perdido la capacidad de hablar.{/n} «Lord Capitán, cualquier alegación de sentimientos impropios o relaciones no autorizadas es completamente infundada y rayana en el insulto!». {n}Frunce el ceño y repite:{/n} «Completamente infundadas».

languages.text: 「なんですと？」{n}アベラルドは絶句した。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、不適切な感情や公に認められていない関係を述べ立てることは、根拠のないものであり、侮辱ですらあります！」{n}彼は眉をひそめて付け加えた。{/n}「まったく、根拠がありません」
languages.original_text: "What?" {n}Abelard appears to have lost the power of speech.{/n} "Lord Captain, any allegations of improper feelings or unsanctioned relations are utterly baseless and bordering on the insulting!" {n}He furrows his brow and adds,{/n} "Utterly baseless."

traits.locale_text: 「なんですと？」{n}アベラルドは絶句した。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、不適切な感情や公に認められていない関係を述べ立てることは、根拠のないものであり、侮辱ですらあります！」{n}彼は眉をひそめて付け加えた。{/n}「まったく、根拠がありません」

languages.text: "Was?" {n}Abelard scheint die Fähigkeit des Sprechens verloren zu haben.{/n} "Lord Captain, sämtliche Vorwürfe unangemessener Gefühle oder unsanktionierter Beziehungen sind vollkommen haltlos und grenzen an eine Beleidigung!" {n}Er runzelt die Stirn und wiederholt:{/n} "Vollkommen haltlos."
languages.original_text: "What?" {n}Abelard appears to have lost the power of speech.{/n} "Lord Captain, any allegations of improper feelings or unsanctioned relations are utterly baseless and bordering on the insulting!" {n}He furrows his brow and adds,{/n} "Utterly baseless."

traits.locale_text: "Was?" {n}Abelard scheint die Fähigkeit des Sprechens verloren zu haben.{/n} "Lord Captain, sämtliche Vorwürfe unangemessener Gefühle oder unsanktionierter Beziehungen sind vollkommen haltlos und grenzen an eine Beleidigung!" {n}Er runzelt die Stirn und wiederholt:{/n} "Vollkommen haltlos."

languages.text: « Comment ? » {n}Abélard reste sans voix un instant.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, si vous m'accusez d'avoir entretenu des sentiments inappropriés voire une relation non autorisée, laissez-moi vous dire que ces allégations sont totalement infondées et frôlent l'insulte ! » {n}Il fronce les sourcils et répète :{/n} « Totalement infondées. »
languages.original_text: "What?" {n}Abelard appears to have lost the power of speech.{/n} "Lord Captain, any allegations of improper feelings or unsanctioned relations are utterly baseless and bordering on the insulting!" {n}He furrows his brow and adds,{/n} "Utterly baseless."

traits.locale_text: « Comment ? » {n}Abélard reste sans voix un instant.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, si vous m'accusez d'avoir entretenu des sentiments inappropriés voire une relation non autorisée, laissez-moi vous dire que ces allégations sont totalement infondées et frôlent l'insulte ! » {n}Il fronce les sourcils et répète :{/n} « Totalement infondées. »

languages.text: "Ne?" {n}Abelard, konuşmakta güçlük çekiyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, yersiz hislere veya yasak ilişkilere dair üstüme atılan iftiraları külliyen yalan ve şahsıma hakaret sayarım!" {n}Kaşlarını çatıp ekliyor.{/n} "Külliyen yalan."
languages.original_text: "What?" {n}Abelard appears to have lost the power of speech.{/n} "Lord Captain, any allegations of improper feelings or unsanctioned relations are utterly baseless and bordering on the insulting!" {n}He furrows his brow and adds,{/n} "Utterly baseless."

traits.locale_text: "Ne?" {n}Abelard, konuşmakta güçlük çekiyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, yersiz hislere veya yasak ilişkilere dair üstüme atılan iftiraları külliyen yalan ve şahsıma hakaret sayarım!" {n}Kaşlarını çatıp ekliyor:{/n} "Külliyen yalan."
